# Function zeros

create a matrix filled with zeros

    zeros(m)
    zeros(m, n)
    zeros([m, n])
    zeros([m, n, p, ...])


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`size` | ...Number &#124; Array | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
Array &#124; Matrix &#124; Number | matrix
